original_text: And Moses and Aaron went out from Pharaoh: and Moses cried unto the Lord because of the frogs which he had brought against Pharaoh.
korean_text: 모세와 아론이 바로를 떠나 나가서 바로에게 내리신 개구리에 대하여 모세가 여호와께 간구하매

sentences.original_text: And Moses and Aaron went out from Pharaoh
and Moses cried unto the Lord
which he had brought against Pharaoh
